item.description:
Mass Networking is back at Framingham BBC and will be on the 2nd Monday of the Month! *Come Meet and Network with Other Professionals in Framingham! There might be over 100, this time*

Bring business cards, a smile, and a professional attitude because it's time to make some valuable new business contacts in 2013.
Dress code is business casual

(Appetizers, Plenty of Parking, and Team Trivia after Networking)

[Over 100 Beers and 36 Drafts]

Advance Tickets Start at $5 and $10 Cash at the door if Available!
Get Tix Now: http://massnetworking0408.eventbrite.com

*Doing a Charity Raffle with chance to Win 2 tickets for Kelly Clarkson Concert on 5/2 in Boston, A Membership for Barter Connections(Valued at $395), and more! Proceeds going to Sandy Hook and are $5/entry! First 20 to PreRegister on Eventbrite will get 1 Free Raffle Ticket! Also, getting a group together to go see her!*

Raffles are Sponsored by http://BestNetShopping.com (Over 4000 Stores/Websites like Groupon, Sears, Pet Smart, Lowes, Home Depot, Angie's List and more with up to 50% Cash Back on Purchases) & http://Website-Business-Solutions.com (Up to 75% off on Top Notch Websites with E-Commerce and SEO)

*Check them out and Save!*
item.name: 2nd Monday Framingham (80+ Expected)
